thread.title: Damon Albarn: 'Taylor Swift is remarkable, but not unique' - Music
thread.title_full: Damon Albarn: 'Taylor Swift is remarkable, but not unique' - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: Damon Albarn: 'Taylor Swift is remarkable, but not unique' - Music
text: Taylor Swift is the popstar of the moment, but Damon Albarn isn't convinced she's "unique".The Blur singer spoke about Swift in a recent interview with Rolling Stone. © Gaelle Beri/Redferns/George Pimentel/LP5/Getty Images He was speaking about a host of artists, and when asked what he thought about Kanye West, Albarn replied: "I think he's pretty unique."Then he was asked his opinion on Swift, to which he replied: "Remarkable, but not unique."He also spoke about Drake, saying he is "not as consistent as he could be". © Brian Rasic/WireImageDamon Albarn Asked about Rihanna as well, Albarn joked: "Well, she's on the cover of NME, so she must be cool."Elsewhere, the musician has confirmed that he is in the early stages of making a new Gorillaz album, which is currently "really fast" and has "quite a lot of energy". This follows the confirmation by fellow Gorillaz man Jamie Hewlett that the virtual band will be back next year.Watch the video for Gorillaz' 'Feel Good Inc' below:
